programme.desc: Murphy's past comes back to haunt him when Serena tracks him down. The team stumbles upon a hidden farm.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Murphy separates from the group out of fear that they may take the baby away - and kill her. Vasquez and Warren are injured and wind up in an abandoned hospital. 10K is forced to make a tragic decision during a conflict with Cassandra.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: While crossing the Mississippi River, the group is involved in an accident and 10K is separated. At a nearby settlement, 10K and some new friends run into trouble with the settlement's leader, Escorpion.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Near Roswell, New Mexico, the group encounters a community, led by a woman called Bernadette, which they believe is above a secret underground base that may contain useful equipment.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Murphy, Warren, Vasquez and Addy find themselves at a casino while 10K and Doc are captured by Natives.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group becomes embroiled in corporate politics while seeking shelter at a hotel overtaken by white-collar survivors. There, Murphy is hunted.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Near the Mexican border, the group is rescued from a zombie hoard by Escorpion, who leads them to La Reina, the "Queen of the Dead." As a bounty for Murphy, La Reina offers them a reward or a free pass to join her group.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: All hell breaks loose when it's discovered that not only does Dr. Kurian's vaccine not work but everyone who was injected will come under Murphy's control after an incubation period.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In Los Angeles, the team drives through the abandoned city to the coordinates of the mobile CDC lab provided by Citizen Z. There, they discover the lab isn't just a lab - it's a submarine.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In this epic "flashback movie," the gang protects the town against a new enemy known as The Man. Part 1.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In this epic "flashback movie," the gang protects the town against a new enemy known as The Man. Part 2.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren and the group are taken prisoner while Murphy manages to escape with his newly formed group of blends.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: As more people flock to Murphy's new cult, Dr. Merch works on a blend vaccine as well as a booster shot to slow to Murphy's descent into zombiedom.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Alone and suffering from the effects of Merch's booster, 10K barely escapes Murphy and is stalked by a blend.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Doc finds himself taken captive by a psychotic nurse and her surviving mental patients, and he later discovers that 10K is being held too.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Seemingly injected with the blend vaccine, The Man attempts to kidnap Murphy but underestimates the strength of Murphy's followers. However, he does manage to learn about Lucy's existence. 10K reunites with the group.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Looking for Lucy, Doc and Addy run into Skeezy and Sketch, who is running for "President of the Apocalypse."

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Upon finding Lucy, Doc and Addy work hard to stay alive and earn the family's trust. After a dangerous game of zombie hide-and-seek, an apocalyptic fairytale and a close call with an ender, Addy and Doc convince the family to follow them to Murphy.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Doc tries to find a way to tell Warren about Lucy's kidnapping. In the meantime, he encounters a radio tower and castle-like compound inhabited by three attractive, crafty ladies.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren leads an attack against Murphytown to extract its smug leader.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Addy is being pummeled with whatever The Man can throw at her - and Lucy does the same right back.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Two years later, things have gotten worse: Warren's apocalyptic dreams continue while the group fights MAD-Zs.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Driven by her dream of a black rainbow and flesh-eating rain, Warren and Murphy escape Zona, while Doc, 10K and Sarge are pinned down by snipers.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: When Sun Mei and Red vanish, the group must decide whether to keep looking for them or press on to Newmerica.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Following Warren's dream, the team doesn't stop while crossing the Great Pile, a seemingly endless landscape of rubble and destruction.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Lucy fights to save Murphy's life, while Warren and the others battle a biologically modified zombie.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Shaken by the death a groupmate, something snaps in Murphy. Warren is unable to stop him and the others from committing an atrocity as misplaced revenge.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren and the group encounter a mysterious stranger who they think is a grave robber - but turns out to be something much more.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group explores an abandoned TV station while seeking a way to contact Kaya, who is attempting to hide from an invasion of Zona forces at camp Northern Light. Citizen Z returns home after two years.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group returns to Mercy Labs, where they first met The Man, to retrieve another item from Warren's dreams.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: At Mount Weather, the group learns the thumb print of the president is necessary to achieve Warren's goal.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In the mind-bending season finale, the team arrives in Washington, D.C. and the secret of Warren's dreams is revealed.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Following the drone crash, Warren is nursed back to health by attractive homesteader Cooper. Meanwhile, the others finally reach Newmerica, and Murphy goes his own way.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In the outpost Altura, 10K searches for Red, Warren discovers George is an old friend, Murphy encounters Sun Mei in her new lab and Doc runs into Citizen Z.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: 10K and Red attend a ceremony for those lost in Altura. Warren, Doc, Citizen Z and George arrive in Pacifica.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: A new spate of terrorist bombings hit Pacifica. In order to follow his vision for human-talker unity, George seeks those responsible for the attacks.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren and the group wind up at a wild casino and shelter for fugitive talkers run by Murphy and his blends.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Doc breaks out special medicine to treat George's injury and explains the Founding Fathers, the Bill of Rights and more.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group is reunited with old Native friends who are defending a dam that controls Newmerica's water from talkers. In order to help, Doc and Warren undertake spiritual journeys.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group discovers Altura militia forces have enslaved talkers to mine hazardous waste for Z-bizkuits.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: With help from renegade hackers, Warren and George hack Altura's defenses and discover Estes' secret plan.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Estes imprisons the captive talkers and blends, while Warren and George plan their attack on Altura.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: A team starts its journey transporting the only survivor of the zombie virus from New York to Los Angeles, CA.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In need of gas, the team follows a suspicious stranger to a damaged oil refinery deep inside a New Jersey no-go zone packed with zombies.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Out to get Cassandra back, her bizarre and dangerous "family" of cannibals catches up with the team and kidnaps Addy, endangering the mission.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Citizen Z directs the team to a rumored helicopter controlled by a mysterious general living atop a heavily guarded skyscraper - where zombies roam freely.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: After taking refuge in a safe enclave where no weapons are allowed, the team finds itself thrust into a battle for control of the compound against a zombie-worshipping cult.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Lost and out of water in rural Kansas, the team is on the verge of breaking up before arriving at a Wild West-style bar. Guns, liquor and a zombie-shooting contest: what could go wrong?

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: When the last surviving cosmonaut from the International Space Station crashes on Earth, Citizen Z gets a real, live buddy - but it quickly becomes clear that his new friend has a secret agenda.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: While in South Dakota, an imminent meltdown forces the team to help the locals repair a nearby nuclear power plant full of radiated zombies.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In need of shelter and supplies, the team seeks refuge in an all-female compound where men are not allowed.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Some strangers earn their ways into the team, taking a keen interest in Murphy, but things take a deadly turn.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: A change in plans has the team re-routed to a Colorado viral lab located in a nuclear missile silo. The team searches for Dr. Merch, the developer of the experimental vaccine previously given to Murphy.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Each member of the group goes through a near-death experience while being attacked by bounty hunters. Mack is bitten after being caught in a zombie-infested stairwell.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: After finally tracking down Murphy, the group comes across a caravan of survivors transporting victims of the nuclear blast to safety. Along the way, the mission is attacked by "blasters," zombies mutated by the radioactive fallout.

programme.title: Pojedynek Kogutów
programme.desc: Dwóch oszustów niszczy lokalną gospodarkę małego miasteczka, które odwiedzają... ale potem zakochują się w dwóch młodych kobietach spokrewnionych z bogatymi właścicielami ziemskimi, którzy są celem ich głównego oszustwa.

programme.title: Nagroda Jest Twoja... Człowiek Mój
programme.desc: Grupa zabójców poszukuje rewolwerowca El Puro, by zdobyć 10 000 dolarów nagrody.

programme.title: Wybuchowy Joe
programme.desc: Młody poszukiwacz przygód Jakcpot jest właścicielem jednego z pięciu kawałków złotej bryłki, na której wyryte jest położenie kopalni złota. Z piękną damą do towarzystwa Lulu Belle jako wspólniczką, Jackpot rozpoczyna niebezpieczną przygodę, by odnaleźć pozostałe kawałki.

programme.title: Bonanza Kompilacja - Odcinki 37, 38, 39
programme.desc: Kompilacja serialu Bonanza z polskim lektorem opowiada o przygodach Bena Cartwrighta i jego trzech synów, którzy prowadzą ranczo na Dzikim Zachodzie w Nevadzie. Każdy z odcinków przedstawia ich zmagania z lokalnymi problemami, niebezpieczeństwami oraz walkę o sprawiedliwość, pomagając społeczności.

programme.title: Wielki Skarb
programme.desc: Ślepy mężczyzna chce ukraść złoto samozwańczego gubernatora stanu Chihuahua. Nie może tego zrobić sam, więc najmuje do tego zadania czterech oszustów.

programme.title: Rewolwerowiec z Jalisco
programme.desc: Salvador kocha się w pięknej Marii, niestety jej ojciec nie akceptuje ich związku.

programme.title: Ścigany
programme.desc: W małym miasteczku miejscowy szeryf zostaje niesłusznie oskarżony o morderstwo i zmuszony do ucieczki.

programme.title: Bohaterowie Fortu Worth
programme.desc: Podczas wojny secesyjnej, grupa konfederatów z pomocą Apaczy, próbuje zdobyć fort Unionistów, jednocześnie starając się uzyskać poparcie cesarza Meksyku Maksymiliana.

programme.title: Masakra w Wielkim Kanionie
programme.desc: Odnalazłszy zabójców swojego ojca Wes Evans wraca do domu, gdzie zostaje uwikłany w krwawy spór o ziemię.

programme.title: Ponad Nienawiścią
programme.desc: Rodzina pionierów zostaje niemal doszczętnie zniszczona przez żądnych zemsty Indian: Mały George został pozostawiony zemdlony na ziemi, a jego mała siostra adoptowana przez indiańskiego wodza. Los sprawi, że znów się połączą.

programme.title: O Jednego w Piekle Więcej
programme.desc: Johnny King, zbuntowany wagabunda, wyrusza w misje by pomścić śmierć swojego mentora i przyjaciela Steve'a po tym, jak ten został zamordowany przez braci Ward.

programme.title: Przeklęte Rewolwery z Dallas
programme.desc: Wyjęty spod prawa Szybkoręki (Álvarez) napada na dyliżans, którym podróżuje Clay Stone (Beir), piosenkarka Katy Dior (Marandi) i hazardzista Fred Foster (Mathot). Stone będzie szukał zemsty.

programme.title: Na celowniku
programme.desc: Ostatni z serii napadów na dyliżanse na terytorium Arizony dokonuje się na dyliżans, w którym pasażerami są Mike Ryan, tajny agent linii dyliżansowej i Molly Jones, córka miejscowego szeryfa. Bandana maskująca jednego z rabusiów zsuwa się; przywódcę gangu Velvet Clark musi go zabić. Ten ostatni podszywa się pod szanowanego obywatela społeczności i pianistę. Mieszkańcy miasteczka są na tyle wzburzeni ciągłymi napadami, że proszą szeryfa Toma Jonesa o rezygnację, ale zgadzają się dać mu więcej czasu, gdy przyjmuje Ryana jako zastępcę. Poszlaki prowadzą szeryfa do Clarka, ale ten zabija go i ucieka. Ryan tropi go w Gunsight Ridge, gdzie dochodzi do strzelaniny.

programme.title: Biały Apacz
programme.desc: Bandyci napadają na grupę osadników i zabijają wszystkich oprócz ciężarnej kobiety, którą ratują Indianie. Kobieta umiera przy porodzie, ale wódz Biały Niedźwiedź adoptuje chłopca, nadaje mu imię Gorejące Niebo i wychowuje jak własnego syna.

programme.title: Nieznajomy w Paso Bravo
programme.desc: Drifter powraca do małego miasteczka, by pomścić morderstwo żony i córki.

programme.title: Lola Colt - Twarzą w Twarz z El Diablo
programme.desc: Tancerka z saloonu Lola wraz z innymi tancerkami przybywa do miasteczka Sant'Anna. Miasteczko jest terroryzowane przez El Diablo, banitę, który chce sprzedać okoliczne ziemie przedsiębiorstwu kolejowemu. Wraz z Rodem, młodzieńcem, który się w niej zakochał, Lola pomaga kolonistom w buncie.

programme.title: Bonanza Kompilacja | Odcinki 40, 41, 42
programme.desc: Kompilacja serialu Bonanza z polskim lektorem opowiada o przygodach Bena Cartwrighta i jego trzech synów, którzy prowadzą ranczo na Dzikim Zachodzie w Nevadzie. Każdy z odcinków przedstawia ich zmagania z lokalnymi problemami, niebezpieczeństwami oraz walkę o sprawiedliwość, pomagając społeczności.

programme.title: Dolina Zemsty
programme.desc: Synowie barona bydła z Kolorado, jeden biologiczny, a drugi adoptowany, żywią do siebie urazę i walczą o kontrolę nad imperium ojca.

programme.title: El Rojo
programme.desc: Rodzina Sorensonów zostaje zamordowana. Wygląda na to, że przez Indian. Obok miejsca zbrodni wyrasta miasteczko Gold Hill, którym rządzi grupę biznesmenów.

programme.title: Śmierć na Wysokim Wzgórzu
programme.desc: Ważny skok idzie źle, gdy dwaj młodzi mężczyźni stają na drodze meksykańskich bandytów i złego, skorumpowanego biznesmena. Ci będą chcieli odzyskać skradziony łup.

programme.title: Samotna Siódemka
programme.desc: Rodzina z pogranicza przemierza Stany Zjednoczone pociągiem z wagonami, w nadziei na lepsze życie na Terytorium Oregonu.

programme.title: Niesłusznie oskarżeni
programme.desc: Trzej kowboje, Wes, Vern i Otis, przypadkowo trafiają do kryjówki bandytów. Gdy grupa mścicieli atakuje chatę, Wes i Vern uciekają, lecz zostają omyłkowo uznani za członków gangu. Ścigani przez prawo, muszą udowodnić swoją niewinność, zanim dopadnie ich niesprawiedliwa kara.

programme.title: Podwójny Judasz
programme.desc: Luke Barret traci pamięć w wyniku urazu głowy, którego doznał podczas strzelaniny. Próbując odnaleźć człowieka, który chciał go zabić, Luk odkryje straszną prawdę o swojej rodzinie, a także, że sam był płatnym rewolwerowcem.

programme.title: Trumna Dla Szeryfa
programme.desc: Anthony Steffen wciela się w rolę Shenandoah, człowieka zagadki, który dołącza do złowrogiej bandy rozbójników po przejściu niemal niemożliwej do wykonania i wymagającej śmierci inicjacji.

programme.title: Siedem Rewolwerów, Jedna Masakra
programme.desc: Mężczyzna zostaje aresztowany, osądzony i skazany za napad, który w rzeczywistości popełnił ktoś inny.

programme.title: Może Bóg ci wybaczy... lecz nie ja
programme.desc: Kiedy Cjamango jest z dala od swojego rancza, sześciu bandytów atakuje i zabija wszystkich członków jego rodziny.

programme.title: Utah Blaine
programme.desc: Utah Blaine ratuje od śmierci Joe'go Neal'a. By się odwdzięczyć Joe zatrudnia Utah jako zarządcę swojego rancza. Na początku Utah pomaga tylko jego kolega rewolwerowiec, ale stopniowo zjednuje sobie mieszkańców miasteczka. Kulminacją wydarzeń będzie starcie z Russ'em Nevers'em i jego poplecznikiem Rink'em Witter'em oraz ich bandą złoczyńców.

programme.title: Dolary Dla McGregorów
programme.desc: Niejaki Forsythe, łowca głów, używa swojej żony jako przynęty na bandytów. Jeden numer się nie udaje i jego żona ginie. Forsythe wyrusza w pościg za mordercą, ale do pogoni dołącza tajemniczy jeździec...

programme.title: A Niebo Będzie Nam Dachem
programme.desc: Dwoje włóczęgów spotyka się i wkrótce stają się towarzyszami podróży. Ale jeden z nich, Tim (Gemma), jest ścigany przez szalonego mordercę i jego bandę rewolwerowców, którzy chcą wyrównać stare porachunki.

programme.title: Trzy Dolary Ołowiu
programme.desc: Rudy wraca do domu, by zemścić się za śmierć ojca, którego zabili miejscowi bandyci.

programme.title: Ostatnia Misja
programme.desc: Sławny rewolwerowiec powraca do swojej byłej żony, która chce tylko, aby uratował jej męża szeryfa przed zabiciem przez rewolwerowców chcących uwolnić skazanego więźnia.

programme.title: Kid, Postrach Zachodu
programme.desc: Andrea Balestri jako Kid Terror O'Hara, przywódca grupy dzieci, które w opuszczonym miasteczku Torque, bawią się w kowbojskie życie.

programme.title: Doktor Złote Ręce
programme.desc: Były chirurg Doc McGregor jest teraz karciarzem. Zostaje niesłusznie oskarżony o morderstwo i ścigany przez Slade'a, łowcę nagród.

programme.title: Oklahoma Annie
programme.desc: Właścicielka sklepu angażuje się w walkę z korupcją w swoim mieście, Ma także nadzieję przyciągnąć uwagę przystojnego nowego szeryfa.

programme.title: Dni Przemocy
programme.desc: W ostatnich miesiącach wojny secesyjnej brat Joego zostaje niesprawiedliwie zabity przez Clifforda, kapitana armii północnej. Joe postanawia dołączyć do grupy południowców zdeterminowanych, by stawiać opór do końca.

programme.title: Zbuntowany Rewolwerowiec
programme.desc: Mężczyzna szkoli się, żeby stać się najlepszym strzelcem Zachodu i pozbyć się gangu zabójców, którzy zamordowali jego rodziców.

programme.title: Nawet Django ma Swoją Cenę
programme.desc: Narzeczona Django została uprowadzona. Ten musi ją uratować, ale nie jest to takie proste. Porywaczami są bracia Cortez i ich gang.

programme.title: Porachunki Rewolwerowców
programme.desc: Tajemniczy nieznajomy pojawia się, by dokonać przerażającej zemsty na byłych konfederackich oficerach, którzy podczas wojny secesyjnej zdradzili i byli odpowiedzialni za masakrę swojego oddziału.

programme.title: Pojedynek w Durango
programme.desc: Dan Tomlinson, znany kiedyś jako Will Sabre, próbuje zerwać z przeszłością, ale jego były gang chce go zmusić do powrotu. Po drodze spotyka osieroconego chłopca i zaczyna pracę w banku. Gdy dochodzi do napadu, Dan zostaje oskarżony o współpracę z przestępcami i musi oczyścić swoje imię.

programme.title: Yuma
programme.desc: Yuma to western z 1971 roku, z Clintem Walkerem w roli głównej, wyreżyserowany przez Teda Posta i nakręcony w Old Tucson. Film był pierwotnie pilotem telewizyjnym, który pojawił się w programie ABC Movie of the Week.

programme.title: Adventures of Gallant Bess
programme.desc: Rather than a gorgeous Hollywood starlet, actor Cameron Mitchell (Carousel), playing cowboy Ted Daniels, shares the screen in this film with a magnificent wild horse named Gallant Bess, who he tames, trains and keeps for himself. But after Ted is gravely injured in a fixed rodeo, Bess is stolen away from him and forced to join a cruel traveling carnival in this fast-paced western from director Lew Landers (The Adventures of Rin Tin Tin).

programme.title: Gunsmoke Ranch
programme.desc: Flagg is relocating flood victims to Gunsmoke Ranch. The Three Mesquiteers know Flagg to be a crook and try to warn them. They ignore the warning and improve the land only to find that it has been condemned for a new dam.

programme.title: Law of the Pampas
programme.desc: Murder below the Equator...and Hopalong Cassidy races to action in the heart of the wild Pampas country !Hoppy (William Boyd) and his pal Lucky (Russell Hayden) head to South America to look after a herd of cattle sold by Cassidy's boss to an Argentine rancher. Unfortunately, the scoundrel Ralph Merritt (Sidney Blackmer) wants the cattle, and he's not above hiring some dangerous characters to do his dirty work. It's a test of blazing guns...under a blazing sun! Can the boys of Bar 20 lay down the law in a lawless place like the Pampas? Can Hoppy and his gang succeed in what is truly a last frontier? Watch and see!

programme.title: A Lust to Kill
programme.desc: An imprisoned outlaw escapes and goes on the hunt for his brothers murderers, who just happen to be members of the outlaws own gang. He and his beloved hit the trail, but are pursued by local law enforcement, who have their own plans for justice. Starring Don Megowan, Jim Davis, and Allison Hayes.

programme.title: The Fighting Redhead
programme.desc: When a rustler named Faro kills one of his own henchmen and blames it on Sheila O'Conner, Red and Little Beaver set out to clear Sheila and to find evidence against Faro and his gang.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: The Cartwrights try to invalidate a Spanish land grant to stop the De La Cuesta family from taking part of the Ponderosa and all of the Carson Valley settlers' land.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.sub-title: S01 : E22 Blood on the Land
programme.desc: Adam Cartwright finds himself hostage to Jeb, a dangerous sheep herder who wants Ben to sign over a large plot of land.Starring Michael Landon as Little Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Ben helps three deserters, escaped from an Army stockade. Learning what they had to deal with, Ben promises to share the truth with his friend who is in charge of the fort.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Ben and Adam are in jail, about to be hung for a crime they didn't commit. Joe and Hoss must find out why the witnesses to the alleged crime have lied about what happened before the execution takes place. They receive help from a vagrant named Lassiter who is looking for the men who committed a lynching in Kansas years ago.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: The son of a neighboring rancher intends to sell their land for a mining operation that will ruin the water rights agreement that Andy and Ben made years ago. Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: The Cartwrights take a young boy to the Ponderosa after the death of his mother. Hoss is the only one that is able to get through the boy's hostility and bitterness, but, as the two begin to get close, the boy's father breaks out of prison and comes to retrieve the boy.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E16 Bobbie Jo and the Beatnik
programme.desc: Bobbie Jo falls head over heals for an edgy young poet from New York. He likes her, too, but he's not fond of Hooterville. Of coure, Kate has to show Bobby Jo what this pompous fool is all about. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963. Look for Dennis Hopper as the beatnik.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E17 My Daughter the Doctor
programme.desc: The family wants Billie Jo to become a doctor, but she wants to go to Hollywood to become an actress. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Directed by Jean Yarbrough. And be sure to look for Adam West in a pre-Batman role as Doctor Clayton Harris. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in January, 1964.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: Billie Jo recieves an endowment, but instead of using it for medical school, she wishes to go to Hollywood.Kate meets with Judge Drucker to see if she can legally prevent the girl from goinng. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Directed by Jean Yarbrough.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E19 Visit from a Big Star
programme.desc: A famous movie star (John Vivyan) stays at the Shady Rest Hotel. He wants to get away from the spotlight for a while, but it appears that Uncle Joe has told the entire valley that the hotel has a special guest. .Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Directed by Ralph Levy. Episode first aired January 28, 1964

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: Uncle Joe tries to convince two rich women that Shady Rest is a farm. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Directed by Guy Scarpitta..Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aried in February of 1964.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E21 The Very Old Antique
programme.desc: Homer Bedloe (Charles Lane) tries to sell the Cannonball to a rich man as an antique.Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Directed by Jean Yarbrough. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1964.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Spur Line to Shady Rest
programme.desc: The Shady Rest hotel is threatened when a railroad detective comes to investigate a forgotten spur line on the property. Creator Paul Henning followed up the success of The Beverly Hillbillies with this charming CBS comedy that ran for 222 episodes. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Quick Hide the Railroad
programme.desc: Kate uses her charms to keep Homer Bedloe from catching the train to Pixley. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Bedloe: Charles Lane. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 The President Who Came to Dinner
programme.desc: President of the railroad comes to visit the Shady Rest hotel with the intention to terminate the Cannonball's service. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Is There a Doctor in the Roundhouse
programme.desc: Railroad CEO Norman Curtis breaks the Cannonball's throttle lever, threatening the success of the Shady Rest Hotel's annual jamboree. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Norman Curtis: Roy Roberts. Directed by David Alexander.Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Custer's Last Stand
programme.desc: The survivor of an Indian attack acquires a rare medicine arrow, and a menacing character named Blade (Reed Howes) will stop at nothing to take it from him. Elmer Clifton (Assassin of Youth, Seven Doors to Death) directs a memorable cast that includes Rex Lease (The Sign of the Wolf, The Monster Walks), Lona Andre (Slaves in Bondage, Death in the Air), and William Farnum (Samson and Delilah). Meanwhile, Frank McGlynn Jr is in the title role of General George A. Custer.

programme.title: Cowboy And The Prizefighter
programme.desc: Red Ryder takes Steve Stevenson, who has saved his life, to his ranch and gives him a job. Red's aunt, the Duchess, knew Steve's father, who supposedly committed suicide after losing his ranch betting on a prizefight. Steve refuses to believe that his father took his own life, suspecting he was murdered. Red and Little Beaver aid Steve in finding his father killer.

programme.title: Riders of Destiny
programme.desc: John Wayne sings! Well, not really. His voice was dubbed here, but as Singin Sandy Saunders hes still able to write the code of justice with a blazing sixgun! Hes a government agent out to help a group of ranchers in their battle with a villain who is tying up local water rights. Also starring Gabby Hayes, Al St. John, Yakima Canutt, and Cecilia Parker, Riders of Destiny was filmed early in Waynes career it was his first for Lone Star but the unmistakable swagger is already in place!

programme.title: Santa Fe Trail
programme.desc: Oscar winner Michael Curtiz (Casablanca, Mildred Pierce) directed this exciting drama about Army officer Jeb Stuart and the days leading up to the Civil War. Errol Flynn (The Adventures of Robin Hood) stars as Stuart, with Olivia de Havilland as his romantic interest (the seventh of nine times they were paired together by Warner Bros.) The cast includes Ronald Reagan as General George Custer, and Raymond Massey as John Brown, with such familiar faces as Alan Hale and Van Hefflin in supporting roles. Filmed partly in Santa Fe!

programme.title: Ghost Town Gold [The Three Mesquiteers]
programme.desc: CAVALIERS OF THE CACTUS COUNTRY--ALWAYS READY FOR A FIGHT OR A FROLICK! The second entry in what would grow into a wildly popular series of Western Three Mesquiteers B-Movies produced by Republic Pictures, Ghost Town Gold tracks the titular trio as they attempt to recover the gold stolen by a gang in its effort to ruin the bank/mayor who ordered them to leave town. Frequent John Wayne collaborator Joseph Kane adds his signature directorial panache to this rousing shoot-em-up, setting the tone for a film series that was so rampantly successful, it spawned 50 sequels and a host of imitators from rival studios.

programme.title: Idaho
programme.desc: Western icon Roy Rogers, along with his trusty companion Trigger, are back for another adventure. This time, a respected judge is being framed for murder by a crooked saloon owner. Always the valiant champion, Rogers vows to clear the name of the judge and find the truth all while courting a lovely beau. Cellist turned editor turned Republic Pictures workhorse Joseph Kane takes the reins of this rousing, musical adventure, which features a number of original songs performed by Rogers himself, with the help of singer-songwriter Bob Nolan and character actor Smiley Burnette (TVs Petticoat Junction).

programme.title: Neath Canadian Skies
programme.desc: It's the mounties versus claim jumpers in this drama from Golden Gate Pictures. Based on an action-packed novel by James Oliver Curwood and directed by B. Reeves Maynard (Undersea Kingdom, The Phantom Empire), the film features an outstanding cast of Poverty Row regulars, including Russell Hayden, Inez Cooper, Cliff Nazarro, I. Stanford Jolley, and Kermit Maynard. For movie buffs: Cinematographer Marcel Le Picard began his career in the silent era and finished with exactly 200 credits!

programme.title: The Dude Ranger
programme.desc: Its nothing but action and thrills when an Easterner inherits a cattle ranch and discovers that thousands of cattle have been stolen. Secretly, he signs on as a hired hand at his own ranch to uncover the thief. Once he realizes whats going on, the city boy becomes a hard-riding, avenging son of a six- shooter! Directed by Edward F. Cline from a story by Zane Grey, the film stars George OBrien, Irene Hervey, and LeRoy Mason.

programme.title: The Gunman from Bodie
programme.desc: The Rough Riders, a popular group that thrilled audiences in the early 1940s, are after a gang of rustlers in this B-western from Hollywood's Poverty Row. Starring Buck Jones, Tim McCoy, and Raymond Hatton, this movie features everything from lawmen going undercover to the Rough Riders looking after an orphaned baby! Also, be on the lookout for the beautiful Christine McIntyre, who would go on to appear in several of the Three Stooges shorts for Colombia Pictures.

programme.title: Young Bill Hickock
programme.desc: Roy Rogers stars as the title character in this actionpacked feature from Republic Pictures. Starring Sally Payne as Calamity Jane, and Rogerss ongoing sidekick George Gabby Hayes, this twofisted saga relives some of Americas most colorful days, and also has time for a few musical numbers, including Up and Down the Prairie, and When the Shadows Fall Across the Rockies.

programme.title: Broadway to Cheyenne
programme.desc: A gang of big-city thugs trying to set up a protection racket out west meet their match in this B-Western from Hollywoods Poverty Row. Rex Bell, billed on the old print ads as The heroic idol of young America! stars as Breezy Kildare, a New York detective who happens to be in Wyoming. When Breezy leads a group of cattleman against the well-armed city boys, the bad guys will wish theyd stayed in New York! The rest of the cast includes such favorites from the period as George Gabby Hayes, Roy DArcy, and Marceline Day. (Day worked opposite everyone from John Wayne to Buster Keaton, but retired from acting shortly after this movie at age 25.) Directed by Harry L. Fraser.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Tagg Oakley finds himself in trouble after being tricked into driving a wagon full of gunpowder to Fort Yuma, unaware that Geronimo and his Apache braves are waiting for the wagon to pass. Realizing Tagg is in danger, Annie and Lofty race to the rescue. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Annie writes to the son of an old female pedlar, unaware that he is a member of an outlaw gang, now on their way to Diablo. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. Also starring Slim Pickens. This entertaining western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.sub-title: S03 : E23 The Saga of Clement O' Toole
programme.desc: Mistaken for a notorious outlaw, a young man struggles to convince the townspeople that he didnt commit a stagecoach robbery. Initially, Annie and Susan Meriwether believe him, but his innocence comes into question when he is present during a bank robbery in which the outlaws seem to recognize him. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: With the sheriff off looking for an outlaw, a fake sheriff takes his place, leading to a senseless murder. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This enetertaining western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy Award in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Waiting to hear whether or not gold has been struck in the mine, Annie discovers a beloved stagecoach is being driven by the daughter of the owner, whos threatening to sell the stage so he can pocket the money. When word comes back that there is no gold in the money, Annie becomes suspicious and begins investigating. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Annie Calls Her Shots
programme.desc: After a jailed Dobie escapes from jail, Dobie and Tagg find themselves kidnapped, forcing a desperate Annie to rescue her brother. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This entertaining western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Valley of the Shadows
programme.desc: Annie tries to help a blind girl find her father's killer. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. Directed by Robert G. Walker. Also starring Judy Nugent, Forrest Taylor, and Denver Pyle. This entertaining western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy Award in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Annie and the Lily Maid
programme.desc: Choctaw looks to inherit the ranch of the murdered Sam Forbes, but Elaine, a previously unknown niece, appears, making Annie suspicious as the men fall for her seemingly delicate nature. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Recently released from prison, Vic Carver, and his brother Johnny, searches for Annies Uncle Luke to enact revenge. Annie successfully gets her uncle out of town, but an angry Vic kidnaps Tagg. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy Award in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: With the help of Annie and Lofty, Clay Griffin, a lawman whose eyesight is deteriorating, confronts Johnny Storm and the Murdocks after they are involved in a robbery. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: After raising money for charity with a circus sideshow, Annie and Tagg are robbed of their money by a man named the Welshman. Annie and Lofty set up a trap with one last performance. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.sub-title: S01 : E24 Annie Makes a Marriage
programme.desc: Annie tries to help an ex-convict prove his innocence so that he can be with the woman he loves. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This entertaining western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho protect a man being chased by outlaws who believe he is responsible for a gold robbery. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951. This episode aired in 1950.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho break a woman out of prison before she is hanged for murder.Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog.. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951 This episode aired in 1950.

programme.desc: A town blames the son-in-law of a the bank president for his murder. Cisco and Pancho work to uncover the truth before the townspeople hang the man. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. This episode aired in 1950. programme.desc: After arriving in the town of Sundance, Cisco witnesses the destruction of a newspaper office. Upon seeing this, Cisco contends with the man trying to take over the town. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. This episode aired in 1950. programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco witnesses a dog identifying the murderer of his master. He then tries to prove that the dog is right. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951. This episode aired in 1950.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: A man confesses to a murder he did not commit in order to pay for his mother's surgery. Cisco and Pancho work to prove his innocence. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951 This episode aired in 1951.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho aid a poor man who gets caught up in a cattle rustling operation. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951. This episode aired in 1951.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco heads to the town of Twin Buttes and finds a haven for criminals. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951 . This episode aired in 1951.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Pancho is taken hostage by a bank robber's sister.Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. . The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951. This episode aired in 1951.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho work to clear the name of a man who is accused of robbing freights in order to force a woman's freighting company out of business. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951This episode aired in 1951.

programme.title: Colorado
programme.desc: Theres trouble out west! Its the Civil War and the Union needs troops back east to defend itself. Roy Rogers stars as Lieutenant Jerry Burke, who is sent to investigate why the returning troops are being stalled in Colorado. Also starring Gabby Hayes, Pauline Moore, and Milburn Stone, this film is action packed with a turn you wont see coming!

programme.title: Hurricane Horseman
programme.desc: Pancho Gomez kidnaps Don Roberto and his daughter, Tonita for ransom. Can an undercover lawman named Gun Smith save the pair, or will he be caught himself?! Smith gets a job in Gomez's camp supposedly to repair their guns. Instead he fixes the guns so they will misfire. When Gomez refuses to let him go, he sends his horse for the Sheriff! This campy western from 1931 stars Lane Chandler and is sure to keep you enthralled from beginning to end. Directed by Armand Schaefer; starring Marie Quillan and Walter Miller.

programme.title: Way of the West
programme.desc: Government agent Gordon (Hal Taliaferro) goes undercover to investigate an ongoing war between cattlemen and sheepmen. But he soon finds himself framed for murder! This low budget western from the short-lived Empire Pictures is from the golden era of shoot em ups, when audiences knew who the bad guys were, and couldnt wait for the good guys to serve up some just punishment!

programme.title: Sagebrush Trail
programme.desc: John Wayne plays a man wrongly convicted of murder in this exciting western drama from Lone Star Pictures. You'll enjoy plenty of gun action and thundering hoofbeats as he escapes from jail and then joins a gang, hoping to find the real killer! Director Armand Schaefer (The Miracle Rider, The Lost Jungle) whips up some fine performances from a cast of B-movie favorites, including Lane Chandler (Samson and Delilah) and the great stunt rider, Yakima Canutt. And of course, the film features plenty of fight scenes, made memorable by John Wayne's big swinging' right fist! For film buffs: This was one of 11 films Wayne starred in that year, making 1933 one of the busiest years of Wayne's...

programme.title: The Sundowners
programme.desc: Brother battles brother in this gritty tale of feuding ranchers in the old west. This story of the Texas panhandle stars such familiar faces as Robert Preston, Chill Wills, and Jack Elam, and was a rare film for its time in that it was filmed almost entirely in Texas with no studio interiors. If for no other reason, watch this one for Prestons performance. If you only know him from The Music Man or Victor Victoria, youre sure to be surprised here! (also, look for John Drew Barrymore as Jef Cloud. He was part of the famous Barrymore family, and father of Drew Barrymore.) Jim Strake: Frank Cordell. The Whip: Dave Kashner. Directed by George Templeton

programme.title: Hoppy Serves a Writ
programme.desc: Sheriff Hopalong Cassidy triumphs again in this lighthearted western romp from Harry Sherman Productions. Good ol' Hoppy (William Boyd) has to leave his beloved Texas to track down some bad guys in Oklahoma. You can bet that the action and suspense will follow Hopalong wherever he goes. Also, look for a number of familiar faces in the ast, including TV's future Superman George Reeves, notorious Hollywood heavy Victor Jory, and in his first credited role, Robert Mitchum! In fact, Mitchum would appear in more of Hoppy's adventures before branching out on his own and becoming one of Hollywood's greatest stars. Also featuring Jan Christy, Forbes Murray, Byron Foulger, Earle Hodgins, and Roy...

programme.title: Death Valley
programme.desc: A love story and a search for gold in the Valley of Death! Dubbed simple, powerful and dramatic by the New York Times on the date of its release, Death Valley is indeed an elegant depiction of love and deception in the American desert during the Gold Rush. In what was to be the final film of famed silent film director Paul Powell (Polyanna), a cast of mostly unknown actors produces uniformly excellent work. Lyrical and graceful, Powells film spins the tale of a young boy who finds love and gold, only to have it stolen from him.

programme.title: The Red Rope
programme.desc: Hired killers and Old West outlaws stand front and center in this riveting tale from Hollywoods Poverty Row. Bob Steele, one of the busiest stars in movie history (everything from the silent era to Republic Pictures to working with Clint Eastwood in Hang Em High) is here as Tom Shaw, the target of a bad mans desperation and hate. Steele appeared in more than 240 movies and television shows, but was never more impressive than in The Red Rope!

programme.title: Ridin' the Lone Trail
programme.desc: Sam Newfield directs this Western about a group of outlaws who are robbing stagecoaches while being led by a mysterious outlaw on a beautiful white horse. Bob McArthur (Bob Steele) arrives to help and makes a shocking discovery when he follows the white horse to the outlaws hideout. This B-Western, one of a long line of Sam Newfield efforts, also stars Claire Rochelle and Charles King (who has over 400 acting credits to his name, beginning with The Birth of a Nation in 1915 and ending in 1957 (his death)!

programme.title: Abilene Town
programme.desc: Ablaze with guns and guts and glory! Randolph Scott headlines as a star studded cast in this yarn about battling homesteaders. Director Edwin L. Marin (Tall in the Saddle) spins this dramatic post-Civil War tale that takes place in the legendary cow town of Abilene, Kansas, coaxing fine performances from the likes of Ann Dvorak, Edgar Buchanan, Thonda Fleming, and Lloyd Bridges. Saddle up and hang on!

programme.title: Hit the Saddle
programme.desc: The Three Mesquiteers get involved when a local sheriff is killed in this B-western from Republic Pictures. The trouble starts when a villainous rancher (J.P. McGowan) plots to steal some government protected horses. Bob Livingstone, Max Terhune, and Ray Corrigan star as the gallant Mesquiteers, while a young Rita Hayworth (Gilda, The Lady From Shanghai) appears as a sexy saloon singer who turns a Mesquiteer's head.

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: Pat Gallagher and his sidekick Stoney Crockett are Secret Service agents in the Old West, dispatched by the government to investigate crimes threatening the young nation. In General Delivery, the G-men crack a government swindle. Starring Russell Hayden, Jackie Coogan

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: In Gypsy Traders, a band of gypsies settles down in the Montana Territory to take advantage of the copper stakes they've made in the region. In the nearby town of Bender, a group of shady locals believe the settlers should be stripped of their rights and take the matter to court. When it looks like the judge is going to rule for the gypsies, the outlaws kidnap him and lock him in the local jail.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Courtship of Floyd Smoot
programme.desc: Kate's intentions are mistaken when she tries to help Floyd Smoot regain his confidence after being slighted by the woman he loves, a bride he had ordered by mail! Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Floyd Smoot: Rafe Davis.Directed by Sherman Marks. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Please Buy My Violets
programme.desc: Kate is forced to peddle cologne when Uncle Joe buys a bunch of cases with the money meant for window screens.Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho get swindled by a fake cattle buyer. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951 This episode aired in 1951.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: A rancher is found murdered after he threatens to disinherit his niece. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951 This episode aired in 1951.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: Following their activity with the Quantrill Raiders, the Younger Brothers return on the scene to commit a bank robbery in Minnesota. Detectives Matt and Frankie work to put a stop to their plan. Starring Jim Davis, Mary Castle, George Wallace, Gregory Walcott, Louise Beavers, and Sheb Wooley. Directed by William Witney. Epsiode originally aired in 1954.Series won an Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: The notorious John Wesley Hardin kills two people while on a cattle drive to Abilene. Matt and Frankie head out to bring him to justice. Richard Webb stars as John Wesley Hardin. Also starring Jim Davis, Mary Castle, Howard Negley, Robert Karnes amd John Eldredge. Directed by William Witney. Episode originally aired April 9, 1954.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.desc: Judge Roy Bean endeavors to exact justice in the small town of Langtry in the Old West. In this episode, the Judge deals with a rigged election. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.desc: A young boy runs away from home because he thinks his father is a coward for not standing up to his abusive boss. Jeff and Roy have to find the boy and convince him that his father is just doing what he has to do in order to provide for his family. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Sam is framed by Duke and his gang, who have kidnapped Linda to prevent Sam from proving his innocence. Its up to Annie and Lofty to save Sam from an angry mob, save Linda from Duke and his gang, and take them down for their crimes. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Annies younger brother finds himself in danger when he gets in trouble with The Shadow Gang after running away with a friend. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This entertaining western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy Award in 1955.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: Since the arrival of a Lt. Smith, members of the Iroquois tribe keep turning up dead. Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper.Episode originally aired December 25, 1957.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: Hawkeye learns that his brother has joined the British army and is now a redcoat. However, when he is murdered by a treacherous Indian companion, Hawkeye seeks revenge. Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper. Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Little Joe Cartwright tries to help a gypsy girl who was abandoned by her people - because they believed she was a werewolf.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Wagon Wheels
programme.desc: Randolph Scott (Ride the High Country) stars as Clint Belmet, the leader of a wagon train on the way to Oregon. Along the route he and his crew deal with various hardships, including Indian attacks and a fellow named Murdock (Monte Blue) who is out to stop them at any cost. With a cast that includes the likes of Gail Patrick and Billy Lee, this adventure saga was based on a novel by the western master, Zane Grey (Riders of the Purple Sage, Fighting Caravans). Trivia note: The film's original title was Caravans West.

programme.title: Wildfire: The Story of a Horse
programme.desc: Fanning (John Miljan) has his men rustle horses and then blame it on a wild horse named Wildfire. Happy and Alkali arrive and immediately get into trouble with Fanning and his men. When Alkali is shot, Happy catches the outlaws but the Judge not only releases them, he discharges the Sheriff and tries to arrest Happy for rustling! Starring Bob Steele and Sterling Holloway, directed by Robert Emmett Tansey. 1945 (Color).

programme.title: The Hanged Man
programme.desc: After a condemned gunfighter (Steve Forrest) survives his own hanging, he helps a young widow stop a pitiless land baron from taking her ranch. This television feature boasts a strong cast of recognizable characters, including Will Geer, Sharon Acker, Dean Jagger, BarBara Luna, and Cameron Mitchell. Director Michael Caffey would go on to work on such hit shows as Barnaby Jones and MacGyver. Also, look for John Mitchum, younger brother of Robert, in a small role. This movie originally aired on ABC-TV and was considered the pilot for a possible series. Writer/producer Andrew Fenady was behind several opular TV shows such as Branded and The Rebel, as well as the 1970 John Wayne feature, Chisum.

programme.title: Cattle Queen of Montana
programme.desc: Sierra Nevada Jones, a feisty young woman, attempts to stake her claim in the cattle business despite threats from greedy land grabbers and their hired killers.

programme.title: McLintock
programme.desc: He likes his whiskey hard... His women soft... And his west all to himself! Inspired by Shakespeares The Taming of the Shrew (1594), John Wayne (The Searchers, Stagecoach), Maureen OHara (Miracle on 34th Street, The Parent Trap), and Patrick Wayne (The Searchers, The Alamo) star in this western comedy directed by Andrew V. McLaglen (Gunsmoke, The Wild Geese). George Washington McLintock (John Wayne) is the wealthiest man in his territory who utilizes his power and influence to maintain order between farmers, ranchers, Indians, corrupt government officials, and his own family! McLintock is McNificent!

programme.title: The Perfect Match
programme.desc: Charlie (Terrence J) to kawaler przekonany, że związki nie mają sensu, mimo że jego siostra i zarazem terapeutka (Paula Patton) oraz przyjaciele próbują przekonać go, że nie ma racji.

programme.title: TOW
programme.desc: Siostry bliźniaczki muszą zmierzyć się ze swoją przeszłością, gdy w ich życiu ponownie pojawia się zabójca.

programme.title: Najczarniejsza godzina
programme.desc: Piątka młodzieńców musi zdać się na własne siły podczas próby przetrwania ataku obcych w Moskwie.

programme.title: Odrobina nieba
programme.desc: Marley jest piękna, młoda i odnosi sukcesy na każdym polu, oprócz spraw sercowych. Jej podejście do życia ulega zmianie, gdy wychodzi na jaw, że ma raka.

programme.title: 10 tysięcy dni
programme.desc: Mamy 10 000 dni w przyszłości... Ziemia utknęła w nowej epoce lodowcowej, a ocaleni z tej kataklizmicznej zmiany muszą stoczyć epicką walkę na śmierć i życie.

programme.title: Uuu! Halloween Madei
programme.desc: Aby uniknąć kłopotów w wigilię Wszystkich Świętych, Madea i jej paczka zostają w domu, aby mieć oko na nastoletnią córkę Briana. Ale kiedy nadchodzi godzina czarownic, rozpętuje się piekło.

programme.title: Echo śmierci
programme.desc: Agent specjalny James Webster (Michael Jai White) po powrocie ze służby dowiaduje się, że jego brat został brutalnie zamordowany. Żądny zemsty wyrusza na krwawą krucjatę przeciwko oprawcom.

programme.title: Seks, Kłamstwa i Obsesje
programme.desc: Każdy, kto poznałby doktora Camerona Thomasa (Harry Hamlin), pomyślałby, że ma wszystko - wspaniałą żonę, dobrze prosperujący gabinet, dwóch wspaniałych synów. Ale za tą fasadą kryje się niebezpieczne uzależnienie od seksu, które po ujawnieniu wywraca wszystko w jego życiu do góry nogami.

programme.title: Król komedii
programme.desc: Borykający się z trudnościami komediant ryzykuje swoją przyszłość realizując szalony plan porwania gospodarza popularnego talk-show, aby zdobyć angaż w telewizji.

programme.title: Oszukać złodzieja
programme.desc: Złodziejska szajka szykuje się do napadu na bank. Ich celem jest skrytka depozytowa zawierająca tajne, rządowe informacje.

programme.title: McCanick
programme.desc: Kiedy detektyw narkotykowy Eugene Mack' McCanick (David Morse - 16 przecznic, Zielona mila) odkrywa, że pozornie nieszkodliwy młody kryminalista Simon Weeks (Cory Monteith - Glee) został zwolniony z więzienia, wywołuje to nieoczekiwaną burzę paranoi i przemocy.

programme.title: Sprośna Trzydziestka
programme.desc: W przeddzień trzydziestych urodzin Kate (Mamrie Hart) jej przyjaciółki Evie (Grace Helbig) i Charlie (Hannah Hart) proponują, że urządzą jej przyjęcie. Jednak impreza szybko wymyka się spod kontroli.

programme.title: Final Shot
programme.desc: Zhańbiony weteran alkoholizmu musi odzyskać wszystkie swoje umiejętności i wyśledzić swojego byłego pracodawcę, gdy nie uda mu się zrealizować swojego najnowszego hitu.

programme.title: Czas polowania
programme.desc: Warren (Martin Dingle Wall) jest zdegenerowanym alkoholikiem. Po drodze do Meksyku zatrzymuje się w Bedford Flats – zapadłym amerykańskim miasteczku pośrodku bezkresnego pustkowia, zamieszkałego niegdyś przez społeczność myśliwych.

programme.title: Disaster Zone: Volcano in New York
programme.desc: Seria podziemnych eksperymentów wydobywa na powierzchnię magmę znajdującą się w nieznanym „zbiorniku”, położonym dokładnie pod dzielnicą Manhattan!

programme.title: Ares
programme.desc: Francja przyszłości. Władze próbują zapobiec buntowi głodujących ludzi, oferując im brutalny program telewizyjny z udziałem ich samych.

programme.title: Czas zabijania
programme.desc: Stare nawyki ciężko wykorzenić... Zwłaszcza na zmieniającym się południu USA. Carl Lee Hailey, pracownik fabryki w Mississippi dowiaduje się tego, gdy jego dziesięcioletnia siostra zostaje brutalnie napadnięta przez dwóch pijanych rasistów.

programme.title: Sprośna Trzydziestka
programme.desc: W przeddzień trzydziestych urodzin Kate (Mamrie Hart) jej przyjaciółki Evie (Grace Helbig) i Charlie (Hannah Hart) proponują, że urządzą jej przyjęcie. Jednak impreza szybko wymyka się spod kontroli.

programme.title: Final Heist
programme.desc: Samotna matka prosi swojego byłego przestępcę o pomoc w niebezpiecznej akcji ratowania życia córki.

programme.title: Czas polowania
programme.desc: Warren (Martin Dingle Wall) jest zdegenerowanym alkoholikiem. Po drodze do Meksyku zatrzymuje się w Bedford Flats – zapadłym amerykańskim miasteczku pośrodku bezkresnego pustkowia, zamieszkałego niegdyś przez społeczność myśliwych.

programme.title: Uuu! Halloween Madei
programme.desc: Aby uniknąć kłopotów w wigilię Wszystkich Świętych, Madea i jej paczka zostają w domu, aby mieć oko na nastoletnią córkę Briana. Ale kiedy nadchodzi godzina czarownic, rozpętuje się piekło.

programme.title: ExPatriot
programme.desc: Analityk CIA Riley Quinn stracił wszystko, gdy ujawnił informacje o rządzie USA. Ścigana na wygnanie, uciekła do Kolumbii. Dwa lata później prowadzi samotny tryb życia, gdy nagle pojawia się agent CIA z ofertą.

programme.title: Monolit
programme.desc: Podczas wyprawy do Los Angeles matka z synem doznają poważnego wypadku, przez który zmuszeni są walczyć o przetrwanie.

programme.title: Special Ops
programme.desc: Zaatakowany przez terrorystów porzucony amerykański żołnierz walczy o przetrwanie.

programme.title: Najczarniejsza godzina
programme.desc: Piątka młodzieńców musi zdać się na własne siły podczas próby przetrwania ataku obcych w Moskwie.

programme.title: Kelnerzy
programme.desc: Ryan Reynolds występuje w tej przezabawnej komedii o grupie kelnerów i kelnerek poszukujących sensu życia podczas oczekiwania na kolejny duży napiwek.

programme.title: McCanick
programme.desc: Kiedy detektyw narkotykowy Eugene Mack' McCanick (David Morse - 16 przecznic, Zielona mila) odkrywa, że pozornie nieszkodliwy młody kryminalista Simon Weeks (Cory Monteith - Glee) został zwolniony z więzienia, wywołuje to nieoczekiwaną burzę paranoi i przemocy.

programme.title: Blood Brother
programme.desc: Jake trafia do więzienia, chroniąc swoich przyjaciół. W międzyczasie jego najlepszy kumpel, Chris, wyrywa się z przestępczego świata i zostaje policjantem. Gdy po 15 latach Jake wychodzi na wolność, rozpoczyna krwawą wendettę.

programme.title: Ad Astra
programme.desc: Paranoiczny thriller w kosmosie, który podąża za Royem McBride'em w misji przez bezlitosny układ słoneczny, aby odkryć prawdę o jego zaginionym ojcu i jego skazanej na wyprawę wyprawie, która teraz, 30 lat później, zagraża wszechświatowi.

programme.title: Sekretarka (Secretary)
programme.desc: Młoda kobieta (Maggie Gyllenhaal) zostaje wypuszczona ze szpitala psychiatrycznego i znajduje pracę jako sekretarka wymagającego prawnika (James Spader). Ich zawodowa relacja zamienia się w sadomasochistycznie seksualną.

programme.title: Złodziej tożsamości. Historia prawdziwa
programme.desc: Kiedy poniżony reporter gazety New York Times, Michael Finkel spotyka się z oskarżonym zabójcą Christianem Longo, który ukradł tożsamość Finkela, dochodzenie przemienia się w zabawę w kotka i myszkę.

programme.title: Special Ops
programme.desc: Zaatakowany przez terrorystów porzucony amerykański żołnierz walczy o przetrwanie.

programme.title: TOW
programme.desc: Siostry bliźniaczki muszą zmierzyć się ze swoją przeszłością, gdy w ich życiu ponownie pojawia się zabójca.

programme.title: Kelnerzy
programme.desc: Ryan Reynolds występuje w tej przezabawnej komedii o grupie kelnerów i kelnerek poszukujących sensu życia podczas oczekiwania na kolejny duży napiwek.

programme.title: W 80 dni dookoła świata
programme.desc: Mamy rok 1872. Brytyjski wynalazca, chiński złodziej i francuski artysta wyruszają w mającą trwać 80 dni podróż dookoła świata. Korzystają z lądu, dróg powietrznych, mórz i łyżworolek. Wszystko po to, by wygrać walkę z czasem i skończyć tam, gdzie zaczęli.
